remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您建立使用的執行個體方法和類別，以利用新的功能。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create instances by using the method and the class to take advantage of new functionality. 寫入器實作的方式取決於文件的編碼方式的層級。The encoding level of the document is determined by how the writer is implemented. 例如，如果中指定物件`XmlTextWriter`建構函式，這會決定編碼屬性的值。For example, if an object is specified in the `XmlTextWriter` constructor, this determines the value of the encoding attribute. 這個方法不會建立獨立屬性。This method does not create a standalone attribute. 當`WriteStartDocument`呼叫寫入器可讓您驗證您正在撰寫是語式正確的 XML 文件。When `WriteStartDocument` is called the writer validates that what you are writing is a well-formed XML document. 比方說，它會檢查 XML 宣告是第一個節點，也就是其中只有一個根層級項目存在，依此類推。For example, it checks that the XML declaration is the first node, that one and only one root-level element exists and so on. 如果未呼叫此方法時，寫入器會假設正在寫入 XML 片段，並不套用任何根層級的規則。If this method is not called, the writer assumes an XML fragment is being written and applies no root level rules. 如果`WriteStartDocument`被呼叫，然後方法用來建立另一個 XML 宣告，會擲回例外狀況。If `WriteStartDocument` has been called and then the method is used to create another XML declaration, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會寫入 XML 檔案代表書籍。The following example writes an XML file representing a book. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartDocument Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartDocument Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartDocument Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This is not the first write method called after the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您建立使用的執行個體方法和類別，以利用新的功能。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create instances by using the method and the class to take advantage of new functionality. `WriteString` 會執行下列作業`WriteString` does the following - 字元`&`， `<`，並`>`會取代`&`， `<`，和`>`分別。The characters `&`, `<`, and `>` are replaced with `&`, `<`, and `>`, respectively. - 範圍 0 x-0x1F （不含空白字元 0x9、 0xA 和 0xD） 中的字元值會取代數字字元實體 (`�`透過`�x1F`)。Character values in the range 0x-0x1F (excluding white space characters 0x9, 0xA, and 0xD) are replaced with numeric character entities (`�` through `�x1F`). - 如果`WriteString`稱為在屬性值的內容中，以取代與單一的雙重引號`"`和`'`分別。If `WriteString` is called in the context of an attribute value, double and single quotes are replaced with `"` and `'` respectively. 例如，在此輸入字串`testtest`寫成For example, this input string `testtest` is written as ``` test<item>test ``` 如果`text`可能`null`或`String.Empty`，這個方法會寫入任何資料內容的文字節點。If `text` is either `null` or `String.Empty`, this method writes a text node with no data content. ## Examples 下列範例會將 XML 片段。The following example writes an XML fragment. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.Formatting Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.Formatting Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.Formatting Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.Formatting Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.Formatting Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.Formatting Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 產生和寫入 Surrogate 字元字組的 Surrogate 字元實體。

span.span: Generates and writes the surrogate character entity for the surrogate character pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您建立使用的執行個體方法和類別，以利用新的功能。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create instances by using the method and the class to take advantage of new functionality. 這個方法才適用使用 utf-16 編碼的系統上。This method is only applicable on systems that use UTF-16 encoding. Surrogate 字元實體是以十六進位格式。The surrogate character entity is written in hexadecimal format. Surrogate 字元的範圍是`#x10000`至`#x10FFFF`。The range for surrogate characters is `#x10000` to `#x10FFFF`. 下列公式用來產生 surrogate 字元實體: (`highChar` - `0xD800`) \* `0x400` + (`lowChar` - `0xDC00`) + `0x10000`。The following formula is used to generate the surrogate character entity: (`highChar` - `0xD800`) \* `0x400` + (`lowChar` - `0xDC00`) + `0x10000`. HTML 和 XML 文件的字元集，因此數字字元參考的標記法） 根據 UCS [ISO 10646]。For both HTML and XML, the document character set (and therefore the notation of numeric character references) is based on UCS [ISO-10646]. 來源文件中的單一數字字元參考可能會因此在某些情況下對應至字串 （為高 surrogate 和低 surrogate） 中的兩個 16 位元單位。A single numeric character reference in a source document may therefore in some cases correspond to two 16-bit units in a string (a high surrogate and a low surrogate). 這些的 16 位元單位稱為 surrogate 字組。These 16-bit units are referred to as a surrogate pair. 如需 surrogate 或多個字元的詳細資訊，請參閱的區段 3.7 Unicode standard 3.0/Unicode 2.0 位於http://www.unicode.org，或 W3C XML 1.0 建議事項第 2.2 節位於http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml#charsets。For more information regarding surrogates or characters, refer to section 3.7 of the Unicode 3.0/Unicode 2.0 standard located at http://www.unicode.org, or section 2.2 of the W3C XML 1.0 Recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml#charsets.

exception.span: 傳送無效的 Surrogate 字元字組。

span.span: An invalid surrogate character pair was passed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您建立使用的執行個體方法和類別，以利用新的功能。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create instances by using the method and the class to take advantage of new functionality. 這個屬性可讓某元件找出另一個元件中的寫入器哪種狀態。This property allows one component to find out what state another component has left the writer in. 比方說，可能是一個元件想對另一個要產生哪一個語言的說明文字。For example, perhaps one component wants to tell another which language help text to generate. 語言資訊通訊的撰寫`xml:lang`屬性。The language information is communicated by writing an `xml:lang` attribute.
